message.body: Did you watch the third season of AHS?

Okay because I haven't watched it since the second season and I see that some of the episodes from the third season is coming on later and I kind of want to watch it...but I'm not going to lie...I'm kind if chicken hahah.
Since I'm most likely going to watch it by myself I I do watch it.
I wouldn't say scary but I guess I would say it's creepy and crazy! Like "holy crap" moments.
Okay...so I shouldn't watch it by myself right?
I could watch it by myself but I can see you needing someone else.
Hey!!! What you tryin' to say??
If I am traumatized and can not sleep tonight I'm going to be calling a certain lady to keep me company tonight hahah!!!
